alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:31PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Owyhee County through 400 PM MDT... At 331 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clover Butte, or 36 miles north of Jarbidge, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clover Butte around 350 PM MDT. Clover Creek Crossing, Juniper Ranch and Horse Butte around 400 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
